so I make code.org and scratch games and put them on here to promote them this game is called ANT from scratch

creator notes---------------

                   HEXAGON TILE GAME WIP WORK IN PROGRESS *currently no objective* ★CONTROLS★ STANDARD -Up Arrow or W to move forward -Down Arrow or S to move backward -Left and Right Arrow or A and D to change direction -Z or B to dash MOBILE -Tap and drag to move ★TIPS★ -Go near dirt to dig through it -Don't run out of air while you are underwater ★NOTES★ #6 on trending!! (Can we get to #1?) Top loved!! Finally! A tile system making use of hexagons without ridiculously complex coding! A level generator like this could probably create some really nice looking smooth cave levels. There is currently no way to win this game, as this was made just to test a hexagonal tile system. This project will generate you a random level filled with pools, tunnels, dirt and stone for you to explore! ★CREDITS★ Coding - Me Art - Me Music - myfreemp3music.com/ Sound Effects - Scratch, and Terraria by @griffpatch Thumbnail Text - cooltext.com ★UPDATES★ v1.1 Mobile controls added v1.0 Shared!
